title: Release v1.5.1 - Memory System & Bug Fixes
content:
## Release v1.5.1 - Memory System & Bug Fixes

### Summary
Bundle recent memory system completion (Phase 1.5 mutable plans) with critical bug fixes:
- ✅ Mutable plans implementation complete
- ✅ 57GB memory bug fixed (build artifact indexing)
- ✅ FTS5 query syntax bug fixed
- ✅ Expanded ignore patterns for major ecosystems

### Release Tasks

- [ ] Review outstanding changes (git status + git diff)
- [ ] Update version to 1.5.1 in Cargo.toml
- [ ] Update CHANGELOG.md with release notes
- [ ] Stage all changes (git add)
- [ ] Create commit with detailed message
- [ ] Run full test suite to verify stability
- [ ] Push to main branch
- [ ] Create git tag v1.5.1
- [ ] Push tag to trigger release

### Release Notes Draft

**v1.5.1 - Memory System Complete + Critical Fixes**

**New Features:**
- Mutable plans system (Phase 1.5) - 6 CRUD operations, atomic updates
- Enhanced ignore patterns for Gradle, Dart, Next.js, Nuxt, CMake

**Bug Fixes:**
- Fixed critical 57GB RAM usage from .NET build artifact indexing
- Fixed FTS5 query syntax errors in multi-word searches
- Batch size enforcement in embedding pipeline

**Testing:**
- 30 new tests for plan tool (22 unit + 8 integration)
- Comprehensive ignore pattern test coverage

### Success Criteria
- [ ] All tests passing
- [ ] Version bumped correctly
- [ ] Clean git history
- [ ] Tag created and pushed
